author: veithen
msg: OMElement has a getQName method. Use it.

author: veithen
msg: OMNamespace#getPrefix() never returns null for OMNamespace instances found in an Axiom tree (only instances returned by OMFactory#createOMNamespace can have a null prefix).

author: sdeboy
msg: - Updated test log files to include receivers package in class name
- Updated RewriteAppender appender definitions to correct package (log4j.receivers.rewrite)
- Updated test-compile target in extras build.xml to put companion.jar before log4j.jar (both contain FormattingInfo but they are different)
